name: arabic-pdf-translator
description: Arabic PDF OCR and translation with dual-mode architecture. Pipeline mode: 5 OCR engines (EasyOCR, Tesseract, PaddleOCR for printed text + Claude Vision and Qari-OCR for handwriting) with 7-stage preprocessing, 4-method ensemble translation (Claude, Google Cloud, DeepL, OpenAI), and Claude-as-judge quality evaluation. Native mode: Claude vision + translation without Python or API keys. Qari-OCR: local 2B VLM for offline handwriting recognition. Auto-selects best available mode.
